sense.name: large-caliber transportable guns, cannon
sense.examples: The forward tank units used their artillery to soften up the enemy's position. In the 19th-century, artillery were transported by horses and mules.

sense.name: military unit that uses large-calliber guns
sense.examples: John served three years in the artillery and his brother served four in the air force. The army's artillery units suffered heavy casualties in yesterday's battle.

sense.name: methods and means of effective arguing, persuading
sense.examples: Betty brought her heavy artillery of spreadsheets and flow charts to the business meeting. The toddler's usual artillery of throwing tantrums in public was not effective against the iron will of his new nanny.
